title: How to unsubscribe from Viaplay (Poland)
description: Learn how to cancel your Viaplay subscription in Poland. Follow these steps to manage your subscription and prevent future charges.

steps_1.title: Cancel via Viaplay Website
steps_1.description:
*   Go to the Viaplay website and log in to your account.
*   Navigate to 'My Account' or 'Account Settings'.
*   Find the 'Manage Package' or 'Subscription' section.
*   Select the option to cancel your subscription.
*   Confirm your cancellation request.
*   Check for a confirmation email to ensure your subscription has been successfully cancelled.

steps_2.title: Cancel via Google Play Store
steps_2.description:
*   Open the Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Select Payments & Subscriptions > Subscriptions.
*   Find Viaplay.
*   Tap 'Cancel subscription'.

steps_3.title: Cancel via iTunes
steps_3.description: *   Go to Settings > [Your Name] > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions.
